key_points: Nina Celie Angelo reported witnessing an explosive argument between Gabby Petito and Brian Laundrie at the Merry Piglet restaurant in Jackson, Wyoming.
The Blue-Collar Restaurant Group confirmed that Petito and Laundrie were present at their restaurant on August 27.
During the incident, Laundrie was screaming at the hostess and Petito was seen in tears, apologizing.
Angelo described Laundrie as being very angry and temperamental towards the restaurant staff, with Petito appearing upset and embarrassed.
Laundrie reportedly entered and exited the restaurant multiple times, continuing the altercation with staff members.
Angelo observed Petito trying to diffuse the situation and apologizing to staff for Laundrie's behavior.
Laundrie's behavior was described as visibly angry and aggressive, causing discomfort to witnesses.
Petito was on a cross-country road trip with Laundrie, traveling in a cargo van they had converted into a makeshift recreational vehicle.
The argument led to both Petito and Laundrie eventually leaving the restaurant, with Petito visibly distraught.
The public's attention on the Gabby Petito case intensifies as the search for Brian Laundrie continues.
